description:

Subscribe to the channel and click the bell icon to be notified of all the hottest trailers: http://bit.ly/2CNniBy 

► Shop Rotten Tomatoes: http://bit.ly/3KvCU1M

US Re-Release Date: November 19, 2024
Starring: Jinpachi Nezu, Mako Hyôdô
Director: Akira Kurosawa
Synopsis: First released directly to home video in 1985, ANGEL'S EGG was produced by Tokuma Shoten and is a creative collaboration between internationally acclaimed director Mamoru Oshii (GHOST IN THE SHELL), who wrote and directed the feature, and revered artist Yoshitaka Amano (FINAL FANTASY, VAMPIRE HUNTER D). The film beautifully intertwines Oshii’s thematic reflections on philosophy and theology, with Amano’s distinctive ink painting style, culminating in an arrestingly beautiful hand-drawn allegorical fantas
title: Angel's Egg 4K Restoration Trailer (2025)

author: Rotten Tomatoes Trailers
description:
In honor of their new film Highest 2 Lowest, Spike Lee and Denzel Washington sat down to reflect on their 35 years of creating movies together. The two legendary artists reminisce on the making of Malcolm X, reuniting creatively for first time since Inside Man in 2006, and what they've learned from working with each other. 

► Buy Tickets for Highest 2 Lowest: http://www.fandango.com/highest-2-lowest-2025-240338/movie-overview?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc
